title: Walkin’ On Sunshine
lyrics:
[intro] (C)  (F)  (G)  (F)  x2
 
I (C)used to think (F)maybe you (G)love me, now (F)baby it’s (C)true (F)  (G)  (F)   
And (C)I just can’t (F)wait till the (G)day that you (F)knock on my (C)door (F)  (G)  (F)
Now (C)everytime I (F)go for the (G)mailbox gotta (F)hold myself (C)down (F)  (G)  (F)
Cuz (C)I just can’t (F)wait till you (G)write me your (F)coming  a(C)round (F)  (G)  (F)
[chorus]
I'm walking on (G)sunshine... Who(F)ah!
I'm walking on (G)sunshine... Who(F)ah!
I'm walking on (G)sunshine... Who(F)ah!
And don't it feel good! (C) YEAH! (F)  (G)  (F)  
And don't it feel good! (C) YEAH! (F)  (G)  (F)  
And don't it feel good! (C) YEAH! (F)  (G)  (F)  
 
I (C)used to think (F)maybe you (G)loved me now I (F)know that its (C)true (F)  (G)  (F)   
And I (C)don't want to (F)spend all my (G)life just in (F)waiting for (C)you (F)  (G)  (F)   
Now I (C)don't want you (F)back for the (G)weekend… not (F)back for a (C)day (F)  (G)  (F)   
I said (C)baby I (F) just want you (G)back and I (F)want you to (C)stay (F)  (G)  (F)   
[chorus]
I'm walking on (G)sunshine... Who(F)ah!
I'm walking on (G)sunshine... Who(F)ah!
I'm walking on (G)sunshine... Who(F)ah!
And don't it feel good! (C) YEAH! (F)  (G)  (F)  
And don't it feel good! (C) YEAH! (F)  (G)  (F)  
And don't it feel good! (C) YEAH! (F)  (G)  (F)  
I feel the (C)love, I feel the (F)love, I feel a (G)love that's really (F)real! 
I feel the (C)love, I feel the (F)love, I feel a (G)love that's really (F)real! 
(C)  (F)  (G)  I'm (F)walking on sunshine!
(C-single strum) [end]
